title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Prerequisites: AE60001, AE60007 Ram and scramjets, ram rockets, space planes, Classification and performance analysis of nuclear fission and fusion rockets. Plasma rockets, Electrostatic thrusters, MHD propulsion, laser rockets, solar thermal rockets, solar sail, and other advanced propulsion concepts.
